characters.name: Yuuta Togashi
alt_names: Dark Flame Master (ダークフレイムマスター)
characters.description: A high school boy who used to be a delusional teen, believing himself to be the Dark Flame Master and becoming alienated from everyone as a result. Finding this to be embarrassing, he attempts to erase this past from existence, even choosing to go to a separate high school from all of his junior high school classmates. However, after encountering Rikka, his past delusions come back to haunt him.

characters.name: Rikka Takanashi
alt_names: Wielder of Tyrant's Eye (邪王真眼)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")

Rikka Takanashi is an active Chuunibyou, who still has the syndrome. Her delusional syndrome involves her right eye which she calls her "Wicked Eye," which, according to her, wields darkness tamed by the power of a pure heart. In reality, her so-called "Wicked Eye" is nothing more than a colored contact lens which she conceals underneath an eyepatch. Despite being quite attached to Yuuta, she is cautious of strangers and adopts a battle pose whenever she meets someone for the first time. She is also rather clumsy, often tripping over and forgetting things. She also doesn't have many friends, as shown that in her mobile phone only has her sister's email.  

~!Rikka's father died in the past, which she stubbornly denies. In the process, she one-sidedly met Yuuta, who was an active chuunibyou at that time, and was amazed by how cool Yuuta was as the Dark Flame Master. Her belief that her father is in the "horizon" is the cause of her chuunibyou.!~  ~!Rikka eventually falls in love with Yuuta and makes a contract with him.!~

characters.name: Satone Shichimiya
characters.description:
Yuuta's friend from middle school with whom she went on delusional adventures. Shichimiya believes to have a magical ring called "Saturn VII" and calls herself "Sophia Ring SP Saturn VII."

~!During their middle school time, she realized that she fell in love with Yuuta but in the end decided not to change and remain a magical girl. Once reunited in present time, the old feelings eventually come back and she has to make the choice again - this time supporting Rikka.!~

characters.name: Shinka Nibutani
characters.description: A beautiful girl in Yuuta's class. Shinka is Yuuta's classmate and class representative, who is also a cheerleader. One of the most popular girls in the class due to her looks, she is generally thought of a kind and gentle girl.   ~!She too suffered a case of eighth-grader syndrome, going by the name of Forest Summer. Like Yuuta, she chose a school that none of her former classmates were going to so she could escape from her embarrassing past.   When she is with Yuuta, Rikka, and the others in the clubroom, her usual happy, sweet demeanor fades and she is blunt, edgy, and tends to fight with Dekomori quite a lot. This is because Dekomori admires Forest Summer (and does not believe Shinka is actually Forest Summer, constantly referring to Shinka as "fake Forest Summer") and has numerous copies of books, consisting of documents that Forest Summer had written, titled Mabinogion. Shinka seeks to destroy every last trace of her past, and Dekomori is a barrier against this, causing frequent fights between them.!~

characters.name: Sanae Dekomori
characters.description:
Sanae is an underclassman to the rest of the club members. She, like Rikka, is a Chuunibyou. She claims that she is Rikka's servant and wants to take her master's place. Her "power" is Mjolnir, a pair of hair nunchucks. Despite being a Chuunibyou, she is top in her class. Little was known about her relatives but it's implied that she is from a rich family.  

~!She eventually becomes the student council president with Nibutani as her vice president.
Her "nunchucks" are filled with candy, since her previous attempt with cookies didn't go well.!~
(Source: Anime News Network)

characters.name: Kumin Tsuyuri
characters.description: Kumin is Yuuta's chill and carefree senpai who loves adventures, cats, and pillows. Spends most of the time in the club room napping. She adores any chuunibyous and once said that it would've been fun to have some delusions herself.

characters.name: Makoto Isshiki
characters.description: Yuuta's classmate and friend. He created a "cutie poll" which ranked all the girls in class in terms of cuteness. However, because of this, his head was shaved into a crew cut. Later on he joins Rikka's club and develops a crush on Kumin.

characters.name: Kuzuha Togashi
characters.description: Kuzuha is Yuuta's younger sister who is in the first year of junior high school. She knows Yuuta very well, especially how he acted during his Chuunibyou days in middle school as Dark Flame Master, though she always considered him embarrassing. Kuzuha got used to her older brother's delusions since she was young. Every once in a while she would ponder if her brother's acts were actually cool before immediately dismissing the thought as Yuuta would spectacularly embarrass himself yet again.

characters.name: Touka Takanashi
characters.description:
Older sister to Rikka Takanashi. According to Rikka, she is the alleged powerful and overseeing Priestess of the Deep Horizon. She uses a ladle as a weapon against Rikka's crazy antics. She works as a cook. 

~!Later in the story she moves to Italy for work and eventually marries there.!~

characters.name: Nanase Tsukumo
characters.description: Yuuta and Rikka's homeroom teacher, who is often kind, if sometimes a little sadistic in teasing her students, particularly Rikka. She is called Nana-chan by Yuuta and Rikka.

characters.name: Kazari Kannagi
characters.description: Kazari is Yuuta's classmate from the novels. She came in second place in the ranking of the most beautiful girls in his school.   ~!It is rumored that she hates being called "Wind Chimes".!~ (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Sui Nemuri
characters.description: Nemuri Sui is the president of Maple Hill High School Siesta club.
